short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn specified websites grayscale to reduce distractions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to list websites you'd like to make black and white to reduce distractions. Alternatively, turn on whitelist mode to make the entire web black and white, except for the websites you list.
